Label: CCYYMMDDhhmm
Description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for series with freq. higher than daily) year/month/day/hours/minutes

Label: CCYYMMDD
Description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for daily and business series) year/month/day

Label: CCYYWW
Description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for weekly series) year/week

Label: CCYYMM
Description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for monthly series) year/month

Label: CCYYQ
Description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for quarterly series) year/quarter

Label: CCYYS
Description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for half yearly series) year/semester

Label: CCYY
Description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for annual series) year

Label: CCYYMMDDhhmmCCYYMMDDhhmm
Description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for series with freq. higher than daily) year/month/day/hours/minutes to year/month/day/hours/minutes

Label: CCYYMMDDCCYYMMDD
Description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for daily and business series) from year/month/day to year/month/day

Label: CCYYWWCCYYWW
Description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for weekly series) from year/week to year/week

Label: CCYYMMCCYYMM
Description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for monthly series) from year/month to year/month

Label: CCYYQCCYYQ
Description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for quarterly series) from year/quarter to year/quarter

Label: CCYYSCCYYS
Description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for half yearly series) from half-year to half-year

Label: CCYYCCYY
Description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for annual series) from year to year
